//é€’æ¨å¾ªç¯
long f_recursion(int x){
if( x == 2 || x == 1) return 1;
long sum = 1 ,pre = 1,temp = 0;
for(int i = 3;i <= x; ++i){
temp = sum;
sum += pre;
pre = temp;
}
return sum;
}

int main(){
long a = 0;
a = f_recursive(20);
printf("%ld\n",a);
a = f_recursion(20);
printf("%ld\n",a);
}
